transform_def.name: sineblur2
transform_def.string: let r0 = power * sqrt(abs(gauss_rnd_0)) a0 = gauss_rnd_1 * twopi() g0 = vec2(cos(a0), sin(a0)) * r0 gr = 1.0 / dot(g0, g0) g = vec2(g0.x * gr, g0.y * -gr) a1 = atan2(g.y, g.x) f = if(length(g) > 0.5, g, vec2(cos(a0), sin(a0)) * 0.5) r = 1.0 / (dot(f, f) + 0.25) in vec2(f.x * r, f.y * -r) * weight
